text: Sringaravelan cinemayil Dileep inod killerine varakkan parayumbo Dileep varaukkunath arey?
Annan thambi cinemayil samsarikan pattatha mammotyiyude per nth?
Adichu maatumbol 'estapettu edukunnu' yen ezhuthi vekunath aru?
Pandippada cinemayil meenak muyaline gift kodukunath aru?
Ethil Dileep detective ayi abhinayicha cinema yeth?
